price: Aber lobpreise deinen Herrn und gehöre zu denen, die sich niederwerfen,
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
